section8.title: What is Section 8?
section8.subtitle: America's most reliable housing program
section8.description: Section 8 (Housing Choice Voucher Program) is a federal program that helps low-income families access quality housing. 70-100% of rent payments are paid directly to the landlord by the U.S. government.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to your questions are here.
faq.q1: How can I buy properties without seeing them?
faq.a1: We provide detailed video tours, appraisal reports, and third-party inspection reports for all our properties. Title transfer and money transfer are secured through a Title Company.
faq.q2: How does the rent guarantee work?
faq.a2: Our properties are part of the 'Section 8' program. In this program, a large portion of the rent (70-100%) is deposited directly to your account by the U.S. government in the first week of each month.
faq.q3: Do I have to establish a company in the USA?
faq.a3: Not mandatory, but we recommend it for tax advantages and legal protection. We handle LLC (Limited Liability Company) formation and EIN (tax ID) acquisition on your behalf.
faq.q4: How will I transfer the money?
faq.a4: Money transfer is made directly from your bank to the Title Company's secure escrow account in the USA. Money is never sent directly to us or individuals.
faq.a5: Annual property tax, home insurance, and 10% property management fee apply. The return tables we present show NET figures after all these expenses are deducted.
faq.q6: When can I sell the property?
faq.a6: You can sell your property at any time. We also support exit strategies, including sales to other investors or the local market.
faq.a7: All tax filings are managed by our contracted CPA through the LLC established on your behalf. You benefit from advantages under the US-Turkey double taxation treaty.
faq.a8: Yes, DSCR (Debt Service Coverage Ratio) loan options are available for foreign investors. You can use financing with 25-30% down payment.
faq.a9: We observe an average of 30-50% value appreciation over 5 years in our investment regions. Rents also increase by 3-5% annually.
faq.q10: What happens if the tenant leaves?
faq.a10: Section 8 tenants stay an average of 4-7 years. In case of departure, finding a new tenant is our professional management team's responsibility and typically takes 30 days.
faq.q11: What is the minimum investment amount?
faq.a11: The minimum investment amount is approximately $85,000. This includes fully renovated, Section 8 approved, and tenant-ready properties.
faq.q12: How long does the entire process take?
faq.a12: From property selection to receiving rental income, it takes an average of 45-60 days. LLC formation, title transfer, and tenant placement are included in this timeline.

whyUsa.title: Why Invest in USA?
whyUsa.subtitle: Build your future in the safe harbor of global investment.
whyUsa.section1Desc: The United States has the world's largest and most stable economy. The real estate market is strictly protected by regulations, and investor rights are safeguarded. Owning assets in dollars is the strongest protection against inflation risks in local currencies.
whyUsa.section2Desc: While rental income in other currencies may erode against inflation, your rental income in the US is in dollars. This ensures both your property appreciates and your purchasing power is protected.
whyUsa.section3Desc: In the US, title records are public, and all transactions are secured by a 'Title Company'. These institutions hold the money and deed in escrow, protecting both parties. Fraud risk is virtually zero.
whyUsa.section4Desc: Our investments are primarily covered by the government-supported 'Section 8' program. This ensures a large portion of your rent is paid directly by the US government, minimizing tenant risk.
whyUsa.ctaDesc: Curious about the tax benefits of investing in the US?

taxation.title: Taxation and Legal
taxation.subtitle: Advantageous tax structure and legal protection.
taxation.section1Desc: Thanks to the tax treaty between Turkey and either the US or your home country, you can declare and deduct taxes paid in the US. Thus, you do not pay tax twice on the same income.
taxation.section2Desc: The LLC (Limited Liability Company) we establish for your investment provides both legal protection and tax advantages. LLCs have 'Pass-Through' taxation, meaning you don't pay tax at the corporate level; income passes directly to partners.
taxation.section3Desc: You can deduct property tax, insurance, management fees, maintenance costs, and even some travel expenses from your tax base. Items like 'Mortgage Interest' and 'Depreciation' also provide tax benefits.
taxation.ctaDesc: Get professional support to start your investment journey.
